short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes ticks on mountain project for users who you add to the list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Some people log an excessive number of ticks on mountain project and it makes it hard to see what other people are doing. This simple extension allows you remove those people's ticks.
